name: Guilty Gear Judgment
description:
Guilty Gear Judgment is an action game developed by Arc System Works. It came out on 24-08-2006. Majesco Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Guilty Gear Judgment is available on PSP.
Kouki Sadamori and Russell Mock produced the game. Kennosuke Suemura and Osamu Aoki scored the game.
